Patch Makers Featured..

Pretty Sweet !

All the Community members who contributed to the new toolkit Release got featured on Kirti Deshpande's blog .

This sort of thing makes it doubly nice to work on patches for the toolkit .

Community Contributions in Toolkit release 10920

 

The patch I worked on is adding the Key-Value Pair Capability to the AutoCompleteExtender.

Read about how to use this here :
